summary: Wedding day: Morgan Stark.
title: Wedding day: Morgan Stark.
body:
I know I’ve been AWOL but y’all know, life gets in the way… So, anyway, I’m on time for the Pepperony Gift Exchange, YAY! Here’s my little contribute for @hammer227! And I hope you all will like it!

Merry Christmas everyone and Heppy New Year!!!

summary: Tony Stark meets Bruce Wayne
title: Tony Stark meets Bruce Wayne
body:
Tony: so you are Bruce Wayne. Like the real Bruce Wayne. The dark knight. Batman. Batsy. We have some comics here, ‘bout you and your Integrity… Legality thing. I didn’t read them, but you’re quite famous, not as much as me of course

Someone in the back: *whispers* it’s Justice League

Tony: Justice club

Bruce, looking annoyed: You are?

Tony: i would say beautiful. If we are talking about names, I’m Tony Stark and occasionally I save the World as Iron Man, but call me Tony

Bruce, still not impressed: call me Mr. Wayne

Tony: *stares for a moment*

Tony, feeling like the little bitch he is: you know Batsy, in those comics that I dind’t read the authors wrote your account balance

Bruce: *raises a questioning eyebrow*

Tony: I’m richer than you

summary: We'll walk upon these streets (and think of little else) - Chapter 1 - FabHawk, NinthFeather - Kingdom Hearts [Archive of Our...
title: We'll walk upon these streets (and think of little else) - Chapter 1 - FabHawk, NinthFeather - Kingdom Hearts [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/?
Fandom: Kingdom Hearts, Marvel Cinematic Universe, Other fandoms visited as individual worlds
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Minor or Background Relationship(s)
Characters: Sora (Kingdom Hearts), Donald Duck (Kingdom Hearts), Goofy (Kingdom Hearts), Tony Stark, Avengers Team (MCU), Nick Fury
Additional Tags: Fix-It, Crossover, Emotional Roller Coaster, Past Gaslighting, Nobodies as People, not KH2 compliant, Fluff and Angst, Worldbuilding, Work In Progress, Misunderstandings, Child Soldiers, Protective Tony Stark, This fic is not Yen Sid-friendly
Summary:

A teenager with a weird weapon shows up during the Battle of New York with classic Disney characters in tow. Nick Fury is suspicious, and Thor is just scared.

Tony might have a concussion, but that isn’t gonna stop him from protecting this kid.

(As it turns out, the concussion is only the start of his problems.)

summary: Broken Arrow
title: Broken Arrow
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2QWfGYj

by starkintern

Resident genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist, also known as Tony Stark, is on a downward spiral. His nightly routine almost always includes drinking his feelings away and beating himself up for his mistakes. However, that is soon interrupted when Bucky Barnes and Steve Rogers become fugitives and Tony is dragged into their mess. Now faced with the responsibility of fixing something non-mechanical, Tony realizes that although recovery is often believed to be a linear process, it doesn’t have to be.

[ Based on the events in Captain America: Civil War yet not at all canon-compliant. ]

Words: 3029, Chapters: 1/38, Language: English

tags: i have rewatched it and feel The Rage okay?
summary: hello! i am here today to remind you that that the “break” tony and pepper were having in the captain america: civil war was...
body:
hello! i am here today to remind you that that the “break” tony and pepper were having in the captain america: civil war was most likely caused by him refusing to step down and quit the avengers. i.e. tony has (temporarily) lost the most important person in his life because he chose to continue doing everything he could to help the world. 

all that happened while steve (who for some reason is considered the “hero of people”) has been continuously choosing to fuck said world (and tony) over one person. 

have a good day!

summary: Day 5: Secret Santa
title: Day 5: Secret Santa
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Vetv2W

by MsCaptainWinchester (rons_pigwidgeon)

Peter thought the Secret Santa exchange was supposed to be joke gifts, but with every normal present that opens, he realizes his mistake. Instead of fessing up to his mistake, he decides to hide forever. Because that will work.

summary: Lighten up, it's Christmas
title: Lighten up, it's Christmas
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2QYjbNU

by SophieRomanoff97

Christmas at Avengers Tower sometimes includes getting pranked.

For the first year ever, Bucky is the object of the prank, and actually isn’t mad about it in any way.

The Avengers are smug, Thor is confused, and Bucky is really a part of the team.

Words: 332, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

summary: Inferna
title: Inferna
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2LDtukF

by tylrerhoechlin

Set during IW. Reader is a mutant with pyrokinetic powers, known as Inferna, and a member of the mighty avengers. Tony orders that you stay on Earth during the final battle with Thanos, scared that he would lose you on Titan.

But will you be any safer on Earth?

I suck at summaries, but I’ve been working on this piece for a couple of days.

Words: 2273, Chapters: ½, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M

  • Relationships: Tony Stark/Reader, Thor/Reader
  • Additional Tags: Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Minor Violence, Angst with a Happy Ending, Fluff and Angst, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Precious Peter Parker, hurt reader, Mutant Reader, Established Relationship
